rules_text: Whenever Sigiled Spotter attacks, create a Clue token. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this: Draw a card.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Land ho! Or ... wait. Kraken ho! Come about!”[/i]
notes:
WU:
 - five or more artifacts
 - metalcraft
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
